content: *black cat basics are designed for beginners using basic stitches and fundamental techniques * *seven easy dishcloths is a great first project for someone learning to knit they begin with the most basic knit stitch and then introduce techniques like purl increase decrease and more these dishcloths are a fun project for any knitter and would make a great handmade gift * **needles** 4mm/us size 6 circular needle any length **notions** tapestry needle for sewing in ends **yarn** sesia windsurf 100% cotton 8ply *or similar cotton or other plant-fibre yarn* **quantity needed** approx 46 metres / 50 yards per dishcloth or 324 metres / 355 yards to make all 7 **finished size** each finished dishcloth is approx 18 x 18 cm / 7 x 7 in
